analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the performance test with a duration of 1077ms. To address this, it is recommended to optimize the page's resources, such as images, CSS, and JavaScript, to reduce its load time.
insights: The blog page has the fastest load time (424.1ms) and TTFB (199ms) among all pages, indicating efficient resource management and server response times.
The pricing page has a longer TTFB (306.1ms) compared to the blog page, suggesting room for improvement in server response times.

The homepage has a longer load time (631.7ms) than the blog and pricing pages, which may be due to larger resource sizes or additional third-party requests. Investigating these factors can help improve the homepage's performance.
